ygData.subject: Archery
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi there! Are there any high level Rangers on this list that could tell me a little about Archery please?  I created a Woodelf Ranger yesterday and planned to
ygData.messageBody:
Hi there!

Are there any high level Rangers on this list that could tell me a little about Archery please? I created a Woodelf Ranger yesterday and planned to focus on this skill, but a friend has just told me that Archery is broken and serves no purpose but to pull albeit from great distances. I was hoping that a well developed archer, along with snare could do most damage to mobs before its arrival. If this not true I find it staggering. Its fine for casters to snare, DD and DoT - ie fighting from a distance, but not bow-wielders?
Any advice and general observations would be kindly met

Thanks

Legless, 8 Ranger

Aka Rykk Bloodfang, 52 Monk
